thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 3 of 1678
thread.title: Liz

author: Liz
title: Liz
text:
The best priced deals involved the longest layovers, but the sites features helped me filter those out so I could find a good price with decent timelines. I really appreciate the scheduling table that allows you to look at alternative dates for best prices. In the end, I found what I was I was looking for, at a great price, and the booking process was quick and easy.
Happy Travels.
